00026 #ifndef NOISEPP_MATH_H
00027 #define NOISEPP_MATH_H
00028 
00029 #include "NoisePrerequisites.h"
00030 
00031 namespace noisepp
00032 {
00035         class Math
00036         {
00037                 public:
00039                         static NOISEPP_INLINE Real InterpLinear (Real left, Real right, Real a)
00040                         {
00041                                 return ((Real(1) - a) * left) + (a * right);
00042                         }
00044                         static NOISEPP_INLINE Real InterpCubic (Real v0, Real v1, Real v2, Real v3, Real a)
00045                         {
00046                                 const Real x = v3 - v2 - v0 + v1;
00047                                 return x * a * a * a + (v0 - v1 - x) * a * a + (v2 - v0) * a + v1;
00048                         }
00050                         static NOISEPP_INLINE Real CubicCurve3 (Real a)
00051                         {
00052                                 return (a * a * (Real(3) - Real(2) * a));
00053                         }
00055                         static NOISEPP_INLINE Real CubicCurve5 (Real a)
00056                         {
00057                                 const Real a3 = a * a * a;
00058                                 const Real a4 = a3 * a;
00059                                 const Real a5 = a4 * a;
00060                                 return Real(10) * a3 - Real(15) * a4 + Real(6) * a5;
00061                         }
00063                         static NOISEPP_INLINE Real MakeInt32Range (Real n)
00064                         {
00065                                 if (n >= Real(1073741824.0))
00066                                 {
00067                                         return (Real(2.0) * fmod (n, Real(1073741824.0))) - Real(1073741824.0);
00068                                 }
00069                                 else if (n <= Real(-1073741824.0))
00070                                 {
00071                                         return (Real(2.0) * fmod (n, Real(1073741824.0))) + Real(1073741824.0);
00072                                 }
00073                                 else
00074                                         return n;
00075                         }
00076         };
00077 };
00078 
00079 #endif
